name: Headz Go Racing (itch)
description:
Pick from your favourite Headz and master your driving style in this stylized cartoon semi realistic physics based racing & rallying game. Best played with a controller.

Try RACE mode against AI cars on stylized racing circuits with very tight corners and limited space or TIME TRIAL without the AI cars for more speed and earning more upgrade points, or go Time Trial rallying on the open world rally map based in Finland & Portugal, please dont take the F1 cars rallying, they really dont like it.. Race against your GHOST car and try and beat your best times.

Whichever you choose its all about putting in the miles and winning races so you can unlock lots of tracks, cars and car livery to apply.


Pick from a selection of great cars, earn upgrade points by putting in the miles and then add the upgrades to further improve your car and bring down them lap times.

The cars are semi realistic physics based cars, which can be upgraded as you progress and beware your starter tyres are pretty worn out so get a few slow and steady miles in and upgrade your tyres as soon as you can. Applying the right upgrades and skillful use of accelerate, handbrake turning and braking is required to win races and bring down time trial times.

Select different weather conditions to race in which will affect the handling of your car.

This game requires Steam for its acheivements, leaderboards, player stats, etc therefore only a steam key will be given, to be redeemed on Steam. No other downloadable files will be available.
